Articles.Content:
I'll post a persist once Hyparedit stops being a ***** and lets me launch the other two.

Whats going on exactly?
I set my orbit and I just freeze in place where I was. If it were just one I would just send it there and refill resources.

IDK what to tell you then

have you tired turning it off and on again?

Edited May 16, 2014 by War Eagle 1

MINI UPDATE:

Due to exams starting for me, and other such edu-things, I've been forced to not be quite az active here for a short bit. However, I can still battle, and I am currently engaging daemonCaptrix on Kerbin. (i.e., I'm still waiting for daemon's next post)

Since that's on the ground, I've begun construction of the lighter counterpart to my new SX-3 Ingressor, which will be called the SX-4 (creative, huh?) Dominator. It will be a sort of next-gen frigate/patrol craft.

I don't think there is an engine powerful enough for a launch tube.I have no idea how you have nearly 400 parts.

Edited May 16, 2014 by Spartwo

http://i.imgur.com/eu2ILHc.png

Got it working huh
Had to restart KSP each launch.

Ouch.

Maybe u should redownload hyper edit

@spartwo: now I'm having problems. Every time i enter time warp it says i can't time warp due to acceleration. Then my ship starts moving as if it has a K-drive in it even though there isn't. On top of that, I can't move it once it starts.

Somewhere along the way one of our files got corrupted so Im calling the testing match off
Darn. Well at least I can pay attention to ongoing projects over the weekend.

Darn. Well at least I can pay attention to ongoing projects over the weekend.

Yeah sorry but when both players are having glitchy problems you know something's gone wrong

Ok to both of u
This is two of the four Active Arcadian Union Aircraft, Arcadia Industries has split off from the Arcadian Union and is nearing war with that country.

Remember that hover/airship I suggested for surface/air battles?

Meet the (prototype) Insight-Class Hovership:

Coming soon....
Hey Script, that hovership has good potential for becoming a dropship, from the look of it.

Hey Script, that hovership has good potential for becoming a dropship, from the look of it.

I'm planning on adding a mini-troop bay to it, and some TOW missiles. The only issues are landing gear clearance and balancing the ship.
Vtols can be hard to balance, i just add a load of reaction wheels.
One tank on the COM will make sas redundant. If Script adds no more tanks he should be golden:)

Here it is, my overly armoured ship, the 'Temeraire' Class Something, she has two layers of armour all over (with the original amount she came in at 700 parts due to the need of struts), 10 I-beams with an SRB for desperate circumstances and a wedge shaped hull to deflect some projectiles. She is loosely based on the 'Caesius' Class.

I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds. -J. Robert Oppenheimer

My newest project, Thor, is now online and fully operational.
